import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import Carousel from 'react-bootstrap/Carousel'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import { useNavigate, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import GoogleLogin from 'react-google-login'; import { handleLogin, handleLoginFailure } from '../utils/UserLoginUtils'; import swal from 'sweetalert'; import photo1 from '../assets/img/Mentor.jpeg'; import photo2 from '../assets/img/BookNow.png'; import photo3 from '../assets/img/becomeMentor.jpeg'; import photo4 from '../assets/img/bg-masthead.jpg'; export const AboutUs = (props) => { let navigate = useNavigate(); const handleLoginWithProps = (googleData) => { handleLogin(googleData, props.updateUser); } useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo(0, 0) }, []) return (

For the stammerers
who don't want
Stammering to
control their life

We are non-profit organization with the
mission to provide affordable help to stammerers
from experts

Stammerers

Parents

Sibling/Friends

1:1 Mentorship

Speech Therapists, Audiologists, Psychologists, and experienced Stammerers, all here to help you at the most affordable cost.

Join Events

Interact with your stammering friends who have overcome stammering. Gaining confidence, career lessons and much more!

For change makers

Parents, siblings, and friends of stammerers! You're all invited to connect, share your experiences and become emotionally intelligent.

{/*

Speech Therapists

Connect with multiple Speech Therapists

*/}

STAMMERERS

"I was struggling to find a space
where I can share what I feel since
help was not affordable but once I
found Stammerers Connect, I have
been exceptionally improving not
just in stammering, but literally in all
areas of my life!"

We connect you with real doctors having min 25 years of
experience to help build unbreakable confidence within
yourself.

Stammerers, start here

Find Mentors

Choose from our highly rated Mentors, most of them have been stammerers themselves. Checkout their success journey on how they overcame this problem.

Parents, Start Here

Find Mentors

Choose from our highly rated Mentors, most of them have been stammerers themselves. Checkout their success journey on how they overcame this problem.

Events, Start Here

Meet our co-founder, Samridh

Share your story, and empower thousand of
stammers to create their own life
